name: NLGazetteer
desc: A collection of terms and their labels, which take precedence over a word tagger.

items.name: init(contentsOf: URL)
items.desc: Creates a Natural Language gazetteer from a model created with the Create ML framework.

items.name: init(data: Data)
items.desc: Creates a gazetteer from a data instance.

items.name: init(dictionary: [String : [String]], language: NLLanguage?)
items.desc: Creates a gazetteer from a set of labels for terms represented by a dictionary.

items.name: class func write([String : [String]], language: NLLanguage?, to: URL)
items.desc: Creates a gazetteer from a set of labels for terms represented by a dictionary and saves the gazetteer to a file.

items.name: func label(for: String) -> String?
items.desc: Retrieves the label for the given term.

items.name: var data: Data
items.desc: The gazetteer represented as a data instance.
